participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and outgoing, enjoys connecting with others and values community support.
participant_1.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i am a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and confident, driven by success and passionate about finance.
participant_2.background: i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan.
